name: Justice Buddies: The Dangerous Room
description:
My first Massively Multiplayer, Dungeon Crawler, Roguelike, Turn-Based, Asynchronous, Early-Access, Steam-Deck Compatible, Casual, Pixel-Powered, Minimalist, UI-Oriented, Role Playing Game.

Made for the libGDX Jam of March 2023 with the theme "Pixel Wars". Inspired by Monster's Den: Book of Dread. I didn't complete and there are a lot of bugs, but I plan to keep working on it until I get it to satisfactory level. Enjoy!
